mapper.select: select a.id,a.name,u.name as owner,a.startDate,a.endDate,a.cost,a.description, a.createBy,a.createTime,a.editBy,a.editTime from tbl_activity a join tbl_user u on a.owner=u.id where a.id=#{id}

select a.name,a.startDate,a.endDate,u.name as owner,rela.id as id from tbl_activity a join tbl_user u on a.owner=u.id join tbl_clue_activity_relation rela on a.id=rela.activityId where rela.clueId=#{clueId}

select a.id,a.name,a.startDate,a.endDate,u.name as owner from tbl_activity a join tbl_user u on a.owner=u.id where a.name like '%' #{name} '%' and a.id not in ( select activityId from tbl_clue_activity_relation where clueId=#{clueId} )
select a.id,a.name,a.startDate,a.endDate,u.name as owner from tbl_activity a join tbl_user u on a.owner=u.id where a.name like '%' #{name} '%'
